data.title: Death Notice of Ben Chapman (Boolavogue, Wexford)
data.meta_description: The death has occurred of Ben Chapman of Boolavogue, Wexford Ireland, on 19/11/2023. You can view the full death notice and add your condolences here.
data.text:
Beloved husband of the late Emily, father of John, Beryl and Gillian. Brother of Willie, John, Alfred, Elsie, and the late Gertie. Deeply regretted by his son, daughters, brothers, sister, grandchildren; Cole, Genevieve, and William, sons-in-law; Clay and Bill, nieces, nephews, relatives, neighbours, and friends.

At Rest

Reposing at Kavanagh's Funeral Home, Castlelands, Ferns, on Monday from 5 o'clock until 7 o'clock, with removal on Tuesday to St. Edan's Cathedral, Ferns for funeral service at 2 o'clock (which can be viewed at Ben Chapman's Funeral Service). Burial afterwards in the adjoining churchyard.

House Strictly Private Please

The family very much appreciate your support and kindness at this very sad time and would be grateful if you would express your messages of sympathy on the Condolence link below this notice.
